unnormalised: Someone asked me about property rates in Gurgaon, so here's a breakdown. A 2BHK flat in DLF Phase 3 might cost you anywhere between Rs 1.2 Cr to Rs 1.8 Cr, depending on the exact location and condition. Rental yields are around 2-3%, so you'd be looking at monthly rent of approximately Rs 25000 to Rs 35000.
normalised: Someone asked me about property rates in Gurgaon, so here's a breakdown. A two B-H-K flat in D-L-F Phase three might cost you anywhere between rupee one point two crore to rupee one point eight crore, depending on the exact location and condition. Rental yields are around two to three percent, so you'd be looking at monthly rent of approximately rupee twenty five thousand to rupee thirty five thousand.

unnormalised: Plots are a different game altogether. In sectors like Sector 56 or Sector 57, a 300 sq yard plot can easily fetch upwards of Rs 4 Cr. Remember to factor in registration charges which are about 5-7% of the property value, stamp duty, and property tax. Also, always verify the land records online at haryana.gov.in to avoid any potential scams.
normalised: Plots are a different game altogether. In sectors like Sector fifty six or Sector fifty seven, a three hundred square yard plot can easily fetch upwards of rupee four crore. Remember to factor in registration charges which are about five to seven percent of the property value, stamp duty, and property tax. Also, always verify the land records online at haryana dot gov dot in to avoid any potential scams.

unnormalised: Finally, if you're considering investing, look at upcoming areas near Dwarka Expressway; land there is comparatively cheaper, around Rs 8000-12000 per sq ft, but be prepared for a longer investment horizon of 5-7 years to see significant appreciation. Don’t forget to check the RERA registration number before putting down any booking amount; it's your safety net.
normalised: Finally, if you're considering investing, look at upcoming areas near Dwarka Expressway; land there is comparatively cheaper, around rupee eight thousand to twelve thousand per square foot, but be prepared for a longer investment horizon of five to seven years to see significant appreciation. Don’t forget to check the R-E-R-A registration number before putting down any booking amount; it's your safety net.
